      • findHelperVMs

        public java.util.ArrayList<VmInfo> findHelperVMs(long vmid,
                                                 java.lang.String vmmIpv4,
                                                 boolean exclude,
                                                 int number)
        This function finds appropriate helper VMs that are not occupied. *
        Parameters:
        vmid - VM ID of the requester.
        vmmIpv4 - VMM IP address of the requester VM.
        exclude - If this value is true, it excludes the VMM IP address of the requester VM.
        number - number of required helper VMs
        Returns:
        Helper VM IP list.
